event.title: Face to face @ Ben's Cafe
event.description:
Hi everyone in Tokyo,

Hope you’re all faring well.

We’ve spent a very intense couple of days cooped up at home and hunched over monitors, as I’m sure many others have done.

We’re getting together for some good food, beer, and hugs tonight. We would love for you to join us. Put a face to the icon, if you will!

The team will be there at 19:00 and will prob stay for about two hours (don’t want to be out too late). Please drop by if you can!

Love from the Global Voices Japan team

Tomomi Sasaki @tzs
Chris Salzberg @shioyama
Eric Yap @happyten
Hanako Tokita @mamachari
event.address: 東京都新宿区高田馬場1-29-21
